title: VERBATIM: 'Highly likely' Russia poisoned spy, says PM May
text:
VERBATIM: 'Highly likely' Russia poisoned spy, says PM May 7:58pm GMT - 01:31 
British Prime Minister Theresa May says there are only two ways a former spy, Sergei Skripal, was poisoned in the UK with a nerve agent known to be manufactured by Russia: Moscow was behind it, or they've lost control of their stockpile. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British Prime Minister Theresa May says there are only two ways a former spy, Sergei Skripal, was poisoned in the UK with a nerve agent known to be manufactured by Russia: Moscow was behind it, or they've lost control of their stockpile.
